response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will meet your needs and expectations. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to provide you with the best possible value while ensuring we receive a fair return for our investment. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information to make your decision.", "product_price": 1200000}
